name: Bug Zappers
description:
Overview

Grab a friend and challenge the zapper destroying the fauna around it. You will have to work together as bugs with blasters to defeat the Zapper and bring peace to the land.

Controls

WASD or Left Joystick to move

MOUSE or Right Joystick to move the camera

SPACE or A to jump

LMB or RT to shoot

The boss

In order to succeed players must evade his laser and bait it into hitting it's pillars, the zapper will target one player and will disable its weapon and deal damage if it stays still for too long,  so shile one player has the attention of the zapper, the other will have to expose the pillars to deal damage to the zapper.
